languages.text: Под столом вы замечаете целую гору объедков. Гости, не задумываясь, сбрасывают мусор себе под ноги.
You notice a veritable mountain of leftovers under the table. The guests have been tossing scraps onto the floor without thought.
languages.original_text: Под столом вы замечаете целую гору объедков. Гости, не задумываясь, сбрасывают мусор себе под ноги.

traits.locale_text: You notice a veritable mountain of leftovers under the table. The guests have been tossing scraps on the floor unthinkingly.
You notice a veritable mountain of leftovers under the table. The guests have been tossing scraps on the floor unthinkingly.
You notice a veritable mountain of leftovers under the table. The guests have been tossing scraps onto the floor without thought.

You notice a veritable mountain of leftovers under the table. The guests have been tossing scraps onto the floor without thought.
You notice a veritable mountain of leftovers under the table. The guests have been tossing scraps onto the floor without thought.

languages.text: テーブルの下に、まるで山のような食べ残しが積み上がっていることに気づいた。客たちは、何も考えずに床に残飯を投げ捨てていたのだ。
languages.original_text: You notice a veritable mountain of leftovers under the table. The guests have been tossing scraps onto the floor without thought.

traits.locale_text: テーブルの下に、まるで山のような食べ残しが積み上がっていることに気づいた。客たちは、何も考えずに床に残飯を投げ捨てていたのだ。

languages.text: Masaların altındaki artıklar dağ misali birikmiş. Misafirler, hiç düşünmeden kırıntıları yere atmış.
languages.original_text: You notice a veritable mountain of leftovers under the table. The guests have been tossing scraps onto the floor without thought.

traits.locale_text: Masaların altındaki artıklar dağ misali birikmiş. Misafirler kırıntıları düşünmeden yere atmış.

languages.text: Te percatas de una montaña de restos bajo la mesa. Los invitados están lanzando las sobras al suelo sin pensarlo.
languages.original_text: You notice a veritable mountain of leftovers under the table. The guests have been tossing scraps onto the floor without thought.

traits.locale_text: Te percatas de una montaña de restos bajo la mesa. Los invitados están lanzando las sobras al suelo sin pensarlo.

languages.text: 你注意到，桌子底下残渣剩饭堆积如山。那些宾客会毫不犹豫地将吃剩的食物丢在地板上。
languages.original_text: You notice a veritable mountain of leftovers under the table. The guests have been tossing scraps onto the floor without thought.

traits.locale_text: 你注意到，桌子底下残渣剩饭堆积如山。那些宾客会毫不犹豫地将吃剩的食物丢在地板上。

languages.text: Vous apercevez une montagne de restes, entassés sous la table. Les convives ont négligemment jeté leurs rogatons à même le sol.
languages.original_text: You notice a veritable mountain of leftovers under the table. The guests have been tossing scraps onto the floor without thought.

traits.locale_text: Vous apercevez une montagne de restes, entassés sous la table. Les convives ont négligemment jeté leurs rogatons à même le sol.

languages.text: Du bemerkst einen beachtlichen Berg von Essensresten unter dem Tisch. Die Gäste haben sie einfach achtlos fallen lassen.
languages.original_text: You notice a veritable mountain of leftovers under the table. The guests have been tossing scraps onto the floor without thought.

traits.locale_text: Du bemerkst einen beachtlichen Berg von Essensresten unter dem Tisch. Die Gäste haben sie einfach achtlos fallen lassen.
